title: The DBT Skills Workbook for Parents of Teens
description: This workbook provides parents of teenagers with practical Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT) skills to support their own emotional well-being and foster healthier relationships with their teens. Through step-by-step exercises, parents learn to manage stress, regulate emotions, and communicate more effectively. The book emphasizes understanding adolescent behavior, building resilience, and navigating family challenges using evidence-based strategies. It is designed to empower parents with accessible tools to strengthen family connections and promote positive change.

modules.title: Introduction to DBT and Parenting Teens
modules.goal: Understand the fundamentals of DBT and its relevance for parents of adolescents.
key_points: Overview of DBT and its core principles.
Unique challenges parents face during the teen years.
The importance of self-care and emotional regulation for parents.
How DBT skills can benefit the whole family.

modules.title: Mindfulness Skills for Parents
modules.goal: Learn and practice mindfulness techniques to increase present-moment awareness and reduce reactivity.
key_points: Definition and benefits of mindfulness in parenting.
Practical mindfulness exercises for everyday situations.
Strategies to respond rather than react to teen behaviors.

modules.title: Emotion Regulation for Parents
modules.goal: Enhance emotional regulation skills to manage intense feelings and model healthy coping.
key_points: Understanding emotional triggers and patterns.
Identifying and labeling emotions accurately.
Techniques to reduce emotional vulnerability and increase positive emotions.

modules.title: Distress Tolerance Skills
modules.goal: Develop tools to handle stressful parenting situations without escalating conflict.
key_points: Crisis survival strategies for overwhelming moments.
Acceptance skills for situations outside of parental control.
Short-term coping techniques for high-stress interactions.

modules.title: Interpersonal Effectiveness with Teens
modules.goal: Improve communication and relationship skills to foster understanding and cooperation.
key_points: Assertive communication strategies with adolescents.
Balancing parental needs with those of the teen.
Setting boundaries and negotiating effectively.

modules.title: Validating and Supporting Your Teen
modules.goal: Master validation skills to enhance your teen's sense of being heard and understood.
key_points: The role of validation in building trust.
Levels of validation and how to apply them.
Avoiding invalidating responses and fostering emotional safety.

modules.title: Applying DBT Skills in Daily Life
modules.goal: Integrate DBT skills into everyday parenting challenges and family routines.
key_points: Real-life scenarios and case examples.
Problem-solving with DBT strategies.
Tips for maintaining skill use over time.
